mapper.select: SELECT place_no, city_no, trav_no, place, visit_date, memo FROM place WHERE city_no = #{cityNo} ORDER BY PRE_PLACE_NO ASC
SELECT place_no FROM place WHERE trav_no=#{searchKeyword} AND visit_date=TO_DATE(#{searchDate},'yy/MM/dd') START WITH pre_place_no IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR next_place_no=place_no
SELECT place_no FROM place WHERE trav_no=#{travelNo} START WITH pre_place_no IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR next_place_no=place_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place(place_no, city_no, trav_no, place_id, place, place_x, place_y, pre_place_no, next_place_no, memo, visit_date) VALUES (seq_place_no.nextval, #{cityNo}, #{travelNo}, #{placeId}, #{place}, #{placeX}, #{placeY}, #{prePlaceNo:NUMERIC}, #{nextPlaceNo:NUMERIC}, #{memo}, #{visitDate})
